mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rzlog_financing_project (management_id, scr_uuid, borrowing_unit, financial_institution, financing_amount, financing_type, contract_id, contract_signing_date, loan_date, due_date, rate, loan_term, credit_enhancement_measures, repaid_amount, remaining_amount, loan_state, comment,create_time, create_by,update_time,update_by, uuid, log_create_date, log_create_time) SELECT management_id, scr_uuid, borrowing_unit, financial_institution, financing_amount, financing_type, contract_id, contract_signing_date, loan_date, due_date, rate, loan_term, credit_enhancement_measures, repaid_amount, remaining_amount, loan_state, comment,create_time, create_by,update_time,update_by, uuid, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') as log_create_date, NOW() as log_create_time FROM rz_financing_project WHERE DATE_FORMAT(due_date, '%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') AND loan_date <= NOW();
